title: ABOUT US
content: IIT Palakkad is proud to host its first techno-cultural fest, Petrichor, on 27, 28th October 2018

‘Petrichor’ denotes the pleasant smell that accompanies the first rainafter a long spell of warm weather. The invigorating joy evoked bythe first rain signifies a new lease of life, the beginning a new chapterfor IIT Palakkad. Our Techno-Cultural fest ‘Petrichor’ promises tobreak the loop of everyday monotony by establishing an annualnational platform for students to showcase their creative genius andtechnical prowess.
